article_title: Letter: Madigan should think about term limits

article_metadata.description: In response to the letter to the editor from Sarah Thomas on March 7 ("Time for Illinois to give Shimkus term limit"), I would like to point out that although John Shimkus has been in Congress for 20 years, Speaker Mike Madigan, I believe, has been there for 38 years. We never hear of him speaking out for term limits.
